entry.title: Honey Moon
entry.summary:
Author: Thenotsocrazylunatic

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,484Chapters: 9/44Kudos: 5

Summary: Edward and Dick finally go on a well deserved honeymoon, on an island resort. They go about being a normal couple, mingling with other newlyweds and families.Then their young bartender is murdered and their idyllic honeymoon gets put on hold as Dick is put on the case. If only he would stop feeling so sick….

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,019Chapters: 12/75Kudos: 19

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: I Thought Duty Called But It Was Just My Past
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,144Chapters: 7/18Kudos: 79

Summary: Stiles got shot because of his own reckless behavior and his superiors decide he should take some leave. What better way to celebrate his survival than going back to the place that managed to kill him twice?When he gets back to Beacon Hills, he finds it’s changed a bit. Scott working as a paramedic, a whole hospital team that knows about werewolves, and a supernaturally good high school Lacrosse team.Between the possibility or a new pack in town, a rumor about Stiles’s connection to a suspiciously familiar looking teen and all the pain meds he’s taking to make it through the day, what’s a guy to do first?

entry.title: Spells & Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,084Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 31

Summary: At Hogwarts, where secrets bubble faster than cauldrons and potions are often more dangerous than spells, two rookie professors find themselves colliding with old scars and new temptations.Stiles—the insolent, brilliant potions master—harbors secrets that could burn down the school’s walls… and Derek’s guarded heart.Derek, a reclusive former student turned professor of Care of Magical Creatures, struggles to keep his curse under control with more discipline than desire… until Stiles barges back into his life, armed with a mysterious potion and a dangerously crooked smile.Between transformations, sharp-tongued banter, forbidden magic, and long-buried longing, they’re about to learn that some spells don’t need wands—especially the ones that hit the heart (and a few other places).After all, some wolves… just need permission to bite.

entry.title: Home is where trouble goes
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,300Chapters: 13/30Kudos: 1,254

Summary: Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski left Beacon hills and never looked back. Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski joined a new pack under the tutelage of a fellow spark. Five years ago, he survived the massacre of his pack by simple chance, leaving him with the children of his alpha in his custody.Nine years ago, Stiles vowed to never return to Beacon Hills. What happens when he finds out his children have decided to go sneaking their way to the hell mouth to know his past?(Or the Beacon Hills pack meet a pair of strange twins who claim to be investigating their own father.)

entry.title: Unveiled
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,350Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 538

Summary: Stiles’ hands were shaking as he took a handful of his veil, though he wished he could act bravely and just tear the material off. He slowly began to lift the veil, his heartbeat racing as he continued to look at the Alpha through the material.'There isn’t another way', Stiles reassured himself.His veil felt heavier than it should as he lifted it over his chin.Calloused hands grasped Stiles’ wrists in a tight hold.Stiles was startled, his actions halted. His veil was hanging just below his lips as he observed the Alpha.~*~Or, can love blossom while hidden by a veil?

entry.title: We'll Never Fade Away
entry.summary:
Author: JustJim

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,005Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Being on the run from Militech and organizing and leading a riot has its challenges, but the trio tends to find some time for each other, and also the strength to persevere. After all, if they want to take down the President of the NUSA for once and for all, they have to hit her and Militech hard with the help of their nomad friends…

entry.title: Demon on His Shoulders
entry.summary:
Author: Mekanamin02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,950Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 45

Summary: An unstoppable scream wrenches its way out of the demon as the feeling overpowers every sense in his body. He knows he’s gripping the woman’s arm too tightly, but he can’t seem to care when it feels like his core is igniting from within.Somewhere on the other side of the county, a boy gasps awake beside a hospital bed. There’s beeping behind him, loud, counting down. He sighs and stands, rolls his heavy shoulders and got to work, not realising he has a demon riding on his shoulders now. A demon his grandmother traded her life to protect him.**************Loner demon lord, Derek Hale just wants a quiet day to himself. One day, is all he asks. But one moment he's at home and the next he's standing in front of a frail old lady jumping to make a demon deal with him. He REALLY doesn't want to accept the deal but... circumstances. So now he's inserting himself into the life of a certain Stiles Stilinski to play his part but perhaps this will be a deal of Derek's millennia-long existence that he will never forget.
